TopicTitle: Challenge- Dock with a space station manually

Articles.Content:
Your challenge is to dock with a space station.

RULES

Any parts can be used, but make sure it\'s fair.

The space station must include the following parts from the DERP Co. pack and Astrobug Enterprises-

Habitation Module,

Support Module

Lab Module

x2+ Astrobug Solar Panels

---

You\'ll also need the docking module thingy from SIDR for obv reasons.

New RCS retrothruster thingies are recommended.

Pic: Above the Command Pod there is a Docking Module. Below is a Habitation Module then a Lab Module. After that there\'s a Support Module. On the Habitation Module and Lab Module there are four solar panels. All of these parts must be used.
Are you aware that ATM, the docking module doesn\'t function as labeled?
Unfortunately, for the time being, custom part functions are not supported, as they would require coding within the game itself, rather than in the part file.

Tried that a bit.

Just a couple of issues:

1) It didn\'t get in stable orbit

2) I didn\'t put the solars (forgot to install this part)

3) It\'s impossible to really dock even with tat brocken chute (tried it later, was not on that flight)

The screenshots are:

1) The launcher (needs more boosters, currently experimenting on something more poverfull, but it lags terribly)

2) Station and orbiter separated

3) KISS
